name: agent-rdp
description: CLI tool for AI agents to control Windows Remote Desktop sessions

scripts.build:macos: (cargo build --release --target aarch64-apple-darwin & cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin & wait) && cp target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/agent-rdp bin/agent-rdp-darwin-arm64 && cp target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/agent-rdp bin/agent-rdp-darwin-x64
